name: eyeDAS
tag_list: emr, hms, medical, surgical-videos, video, streaming, ophthalmology
overview:
EyeDAS stands for Eye Digital Analysis System. Its a new revolution in the delivery of healthcare dedicated to the Eye. It is an integrated web portal, which supports the healthcare providers to improve the patient care and overall efficiency in the delivery of healthcare. EyeDAS is a convenient, fast and secure web portal designed by in-house medical and pharmaceutical experts, connecting all healthcare providers under one network.

The major goal of EyeDAS is to provide the best platform for Ophthalmologists, Patients, Pharmacies, Opticians and Diagnostic centers for fast and secure communication for the exchange of health information.

A one stop solution, for all the players in the delivery of Eye Care.
